Title: PuTTY: Multiple Vulnerabilities
Synopsis:
Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Putty, allowing
    attackers to compromise user system

Background.Text: PuTTY is a telnet and SSH client.

Description.Text: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in PuTTY. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

Impact.Text: An attacker could entice a user to open connection to specially crafted SSH server, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or obtain sensitive information.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.

P.Text: All PuTTY users should upgrade to the latest version:
